Module worldofzuul
Package worldofzuul

Class SpriteAnimation

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.Sprite
worldofzuul.SpriteAnimation
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameObject, Item, Player
public abstract class SpriteAnimation
extends Sprite
The type Sprite animation. Contains functionality for displaying a collection of images or animations.

      the integer property

  • Field Details

    • animationCycleLengthMillis

      private final javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty animationCycleLengthMillis
      The Animation cycle length millis. The time at which an animation ought to take.

    • imageAnimations

      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image[]> imageAnimations
      The Image animations. List of image collections.

    • animationTimeline

      private javafx.animation.Timeline animationTimeline
      The Animation timeline. Timeline containing animation frames and managing the changing of images.

    • animationStringKeys

      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> animationStringKeys
      The Animation string keys. Used for JSON deserialization. Describes the keys in order that ought to be mapped to imageAnimations

    • animationStringValues

      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> animationStringValues
      The Animation string values. Used for JSON deserialization. Describes the string paths of images that ought to be mapped to imageAnimations

    • playAnimation

      public void playAnimation​(java.lang.Object animationKey)
      Play animation. Plays an animation indefinitely using the default Sprite.getImageView().
      Parameters:
      animationKey - the animation key

    • playAnimation

      public void playAnimation​(int cycles, java.lang.Object animationKey)
      Play animation. Plays an animation for the amount of cycles given by the amount of cycles using the default Sprite.getImageView().
      Parameters:
      cycles - the cycles
      animationKey - the animation key

    • playAnimation

      public void playAnimation​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView view, int cycles, java.lang.Object animationKey)
      Play animation. Plays an animation for the amount of cycles given by the amount of cycles using the given param imageView. With the images that correspond to the param animation key object turned into a string using getAnimationString(Object) in imageAnimations.
      Parameters:
      view - the view
      cycles - the cycles
      animationKey - the animation key

    • playAnimation

      private void playAnimation​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView view, int cycles, javafx.scene.image.Image[] images)
      Play animation. Plays an animation of param images cycling over getAnimationCycleLengthMillis() milliseconds for the amount of cycles given by param cycles using the given param imageView.
      Parameters:
      view - the view
      cycles - the cycles
      images - the images
